review:
We visited Dr. Rohit Khandelwal when our baby was 5.5 months old. We just returned back from Mangalore and the sudden change in climate gave her a severe cold. What we most liked about Dr. Rohit is his patience in taking us through his diagnosis, addressing all our queries with a smile on his face and never rushing through an appointment. 

As first time parents, he instilled in us the confidence to battle our baby's various health issues. My daughter had some digestive issues because wheat was introduced early in her diet. She drastically lost a lot of weight and was always constipated. Once he identified the cause, he guided us through the right steps to follow.

The medicines he prescribes, only if necessary, are of minimum dosage. He encourages a healthy diet and home-made food. The diet charts he shares are very informative and useful.

Today, we have a happy and healthy child and a major share of the credit goes to Dr. Rohit.

We also visit him for our baby's regular immunizations and it has never been chaotic.

Thumbs up to Dr. Rohit!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: ** ***** ********** ** *** **** ************* * **** ****** ** *********************** ***** We have been consulting him since our baby was 3 months old. He spends lot of time to listen to our problems about our baby's condition. He then explains the diagnosis clearly and makes us comfortable. Unlike other doctors we've come across, he doesn't recommend unnecessary medical procedures or drugs for your child. I would wholeheartedly recommend him to any parent looking for a pediatrician for their child.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr Rohit is a compassionate and attentive doctor, who puts you at ease as soon as you walk into his cabin. He ensures that each of his patients receives his undivided attention and in this age where most of the doctors look to attend to as many number of patients as possible in a time frame, Dr Rohit stands out with his calm and relaxed approach. His normal consulting session lasts as long as 20-30 minutes. I can clearly bet that no other doctor in Bangalore would give so much time and advise to your child's minutest problems. Would definitely recommend you all to pay him a visit once if you are looking for a pediatrician for your child.

We visited Dr. Rohit Khandelwal for our baby Manasvika. What we most liked about Dr. Rohit is his patience in taking us through his diagnosis, addressing all our queries and the way he his explaining towards the problems with a smile on his face and never rushing through an appointment.

He guided us through the right steps to follow for my babyâ€™s diet. He encourages a healthy diet and home-made food. The diet charts he shared are very informative and useful.

The medicines he prescribes, only if necessary, are of minimum dosage and mostly he prefers to avoid antibiotics. As a parents, he doesn't make us panic with too many medical terms or problems. That comfort he provided us, that made us relaxabout my baby's health.
 
We would highly recommend Dr. Rohit for your kids. If you are a first time parents and don't have an idea about doctors around.

Thank You  Dr. Rohit Khandelwal

Dr.Rohit, is very reliable. We are showing our daughter from 3 months. It's been more than an year we are showing. We feel comfortable. Main thing is, he doesn't prescribe medicines when it's not needed. He approaches the situation progressively and steadily. He suggest normal home food for the kids. As a parents, he doesn't make us panic with too many medical terms or problems. That comfort he provides in any situation is very big support for us.  

we have referred some of our relatives to him and every one share the same feedback after their first visit. 

We would highly recommend him for your kids. If you  are new to the city and don't have an idea about  doctors around, he is the one you can rely on easily. 



Thank you Dr.

I have been consulting Dr. Rohit for last 8 months now for my son. He is the best paediatrician in whitefield. Earlier we have consulted many doctors for my elder daughter but we were not happy with any of them. We are very happy that we now have a very good doctor in whitefield.
He is very experienced and answers all the queries very patiently. He also pays gets into the details and gives relevant information regarding child's normal growth and development. He interacts and gets friendly with kids, my son responds to him happily. I would strongly recommend Dr. Rohit to every one.
Thankyou Dr. Rohit

We visited Dr.Rohit regarding vaccinations and general health for our 8 month old daughter. She was underweight and she did not eat well. Dr.Rohit gave us appropriate tonics to improve her digestion and health. The good part is that he prescribes medicines only if absolutely necessary and as far as possible, only the minimum dosage recommended. 

He also advised us to give home-food rather than going for baby foods. 

Being first time parents, we had many concerns about our baby's health. In our numerous visits, we have always found him patient to answer all our questions regarding our daughter's health. 

He is a good counselor and gives us the right tips for parenting. 
 
Thankfully, our daughter is healthy and happy now, and a large part of the credit goes to Dr.Rohit.

My daughter's first appointment with Rohit was about 2 months back when my relative had mentioned about him. He was strongly recommended by her. After visiting, even I would recommend anybody to choose Mr.Rohit as their kid's pediatrician. He explains every single thing to parents with patience. For him, "no doubt is silly" and that is what makes us feel good. Being an young parent, every little thing seems  enormously important. He clearly explains 'what needs to be done every month' by parents and how to take care. One other thing which requires mentioning is Mr.Rohit generally advises is to give homemade foods for kids. To me this is very important. I hope this is important for others parents too.

Our son was underweight and less than average height. Also,he was very prone to infections. He was 2 yr and 9 months when we consulted Dr Rohith Khandelwal. He immediately flagged this as a Vitamin D deficiency case. Blood test confirmed this. His diagnostics capability is really amazing and when you talk to him, you get a sense of his confidence in his own abilities. After two months treatment, vitamin levels normalised and our son got back his growth rate. We could also visibly notice an improved immunity. We would definitely recommend every parent to consult Dr Rohith for any problem with their child.

If you are in and around kundanhalli and you need Pediatrician then Dr. Rohit is one to visit. I have a seven months daughter. Me and my wife are first time parents hence we are very concerned about her health, nutrition and vaccination. Prior to Dr . Rohit we did consult a few doctors and most them were looking to quickly answer 1 or 2 questions and get to next patients. We came to know about Dr. Rohit from another first time parents and belive me he is really good. He takes time to explain you what stage the baby 8 what as parents we should do about nutrition and other things. For vaccination also he has a good hand. My daughter just does not cry in her last vaccine. 
If you are in need of a good pediatric doctor then please visit Dr Rohit.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I generally take doctor's advice with utmost seriousness provided the doctor is very trustworthy & genuine. In Dr. Rohit's case I found the same and followed likewise. He insists on taking care of the babies in the most basic and natural ways. I remember during my baby's breastfeeding period, I told the doctor about my exhaustion and tiredness to continue so, but he  firmly insisted that I provide nothing but only breastmilk to my baby for first 6 months, and I did follow as he suggested. Now I surely see the result. I recommend Dr. Rohit for his genuine advises and guidance. Thanks.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Visited doctor as my daughter had diarrhea that wouldn't go away since more than 10 days..Very satisfied with the way the treatment was done..he did all the required tests before starting antibiotics, and explained in detail his observation  also gave guidance on the management..Finding a a doctor who takes time to explain about the condition, it's management and also would like to add that he even reviewed her updated reports through call and updated us on revised plan..****** **** ** **** ***** * ************* *** dedicated paediatrician..Highly recommend Dr.Rohit..

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: We are seeing Dr Rohit for our 13 months old baby. ** ** ********** *** **** *** ** *** ****** ********** ******* Very friendly and approachable. He understands the concerns of new mom and dad and while addressing them patiently, he also makes sure that only the best practices are being followed while handling the baby. He is extremely good with vaccination. Our baby had ear infection, fever, throat infection and severe cold and cough. All of these were treated well and he gave antibiotics only when it was absolutely necessary.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We have been visiting Rohit sir when my baby was 1 month old.he patiently listens to us,addresses all our concerns.infact sometimes I doubt about baby's health and doctor will say no that's normal and he is not such kind of person who asks us to visit unnecessary even the child is fine.he infact say no problem no need to visit.. he comes to our level and answers everything.yoy can blindly go head to him and thank me later..(mother of medansh ayan)

He always recommends we give home made food and a healthy diet to our baby. 
Our experience was very good with Dr. Rohit and we recommend him for your kids.

review: One of the nicest Doctor I met. Very meticulous while analyzing the problems of baby patients & prescribing medicines. Parents too get lot of assurance and confidence while talking to him. Dr. Rohitâ€™s treatment really helped in building the immunity for my pre term baby with low birth weight. Am always grateful to him.

Doctor is very kind inhis words and approach. The doctor spends time to get the history of the patient, takes time in explaining the diagnosis of the problem and explains in detail the about the medicines prescribed and which medicines for what purpose. Prescribes medicines which are only required. Overall I had a good experience with the doctor rather than the other paediatricians in my locality. I strongly recommend him.

We have always trusted doctor Rohit Khandalwal 
 He is the best. We have been going to him when my son was 4 years of age. He does not give many medicines and always looks for long term remedy. We are very satisfied with his treatment and hospitality.

we had to visit dr. rohit quiet often as my kid goes to school and get cough and cold easily . till now his medicines worked very well, he listens to all the queries and provide adequate information to us which I found very helpful .I definitely recommend dr  rohit .

I visited dr.Rohit for my 7 mo. My baby had cold and rashes on his groins. Dr prescribed  medicines for rashes and as he predicted, the rashes were gone in a week' time. He gave us diet plan and it helped us to identify taste likes of my 7mo. Understands our concerns, problems and patiently explains causes and addresses our concerns.

I recommend dr. Rohit

review:
We are consulting with Dr.Rohit for regular checkups, fever, cold, vaccination etc.Since birth of our child (Nivin, B/O Bhavani) and happy to continue with his consultation in future too.
What we like the most is his smile on his face through out the consultation, patience in listening the problem/health issues and suggest medicines through proper diagnosis.
I will recommend Dr. Rohit to whomever looking for good pediatrician in Bangalore.
Thank you
Murugan

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Used to visit to ApoloCardle for regular health checkup for my daughter. The experience with Dr Rohit is really amazing. Apart from the diagnosis, he is good at listening and spends time on patient in understanding the patient's problem. Instead of assuming he tries to understand the root cause and the medical history of the patient. The only issue is getting an appointment as he is only available for 3days/week.

*** ** *** **** ************ **** * **** ******** **** My daughter had weight gain issue since months and nothing seem to work out, her appetite drastically reduced and was reducing day by day. Thats when I met Dr Rohit Khandelwal, he diagnosed clearly and said it could be VIT D deficiency and the blood test proved so. 

What I really like in him is his patience and explanation and never rushes through any appointment. I would strongly recommend any day.
Thanks Dr Rohit :)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: We have a  very good experience with Dr Rohit. He is always patient and listen to out problem with attention. He always seems to be relaxed and confident. He always try to explain the cause and   treatment our kid is receiving. His prescription always work for our kid. I would like to recommend Dr Rohit highly.

I would recommend doctor Khandelwal for understanding and listening to patients calmly and his step by step diagnosis. My son was having very high fever for many days and it kept fluctuating. Doctor helped that to get diagnosed very efficiently to the main cause and that helped my son to get well soon. For my second son, we had consulted him and I found him very caring and good doctor. 
So based on my person experience I can recommend.

It was our first consultation with him for our 9 months old daughter.We were much satisfied with his consultation.He listens to all the concerns patiently and answers all the queries. He is friendly and explains everything quite clearly and elaborately.Will definitely visit him again.

Though I had a horrible experience during registration and waiting to meet the doctor for more than 2 hours even after prior appointment, which had led to frustration, all that diminished once I met the doc. Extremely patient and realistic in nature, he put us in ease and also adviced on diet and upcoming important milestones for my son. Limited medicines with extreme care and caution was his simple advice, and we are extremely satisfied with his consultation.

The doctor was very cordial.  *** * ******* ********* ** ***** *** **** ***** ****** **** ***** *** *********  The medication he prescribed was very effective and my son felt better soon.  The doctor was also available to clarify doubts on phone. Doctor spends quite sometime to explain the details to parents and makes them feel very comfortable.  I would recommend doctor Rohit K anytime.

I have had nothing but positive experiences with Dr. Rohith. He consistently answers all my questions before and after making my appointment.  Since I am a first time mother, Dr. Rohith provides a safe, understanding, sympathetic, private practice, and always accompanies his diagnosis with standard western treatment. He is the first Doctor I have ever met that concentrated on wellness of the mind, body, and soul of our little one. 6 Stars if they had them!

We have been seeing Dr. Rohit for our Younger Son wen he is a month old. So far experience has been great, he is friendly and spends enough time to hear out what we have to say. He recommends not to use medicines unless it is really mandatory. We are very happy with our interaction with him

We visited Dr Rohit from the time our little princess (Sanjana) was a month old. Dr. Rohit has been very kind and supportive every time with our visit and is in no hurry to be done with our appointment. He has always been just a call away even when we need his advise when he is not in the hospital. Most importantly we feel comfortable and trust Dr. Rohit entirely for any consultancy on our baby and will strong recommend him. 

Thank-you Dr. Rohit!

I am consulting Dr.Rohit for my kid (2 year old)for last one year for all vaccination and general illness like Fever, cold etc. he listens patiently, understands the situation, inspect kid as his own kid and suggests suitable medicines. We are very comfortable in consulting him. Would suggest him for new comers to Bangalore like us.

Satisfied with Dr. Rohit and currently visiting him for recommended immunization schedule for my baby. Gives sufficient time and explains all our doubts clearly. initially my baby had few minor health issues like frequent fever and feeding issues etc. not faced any such issues since we followed up him.

We have been consulting Dr. Rohit for our son since he was a 1 month old baby. Over the last few months I have found Dr. Rohit highly competent, knowledgeable and caring. I would strongly recommend Dr. Rohit to all new parents looking for a reliable and trustworthy doctor for their little ones.

I was looking for a good doctor for my 6 month old baby when i shifted from my home town . I must say i found the best one. He is gentle , caring and very polite. talks to parents nicely to understand the problem . 
He explained all the symptoms and  cause of the issue. Also took time to understand our concerns.

all in all a very good doctor.

Dr Rohit Khandelwal is very patient, very friendly and he created a comfortable environment for my baby. He was able to diagnose my son very accurately. He doesn't prescribe antibiotics unnecessarily. He has good grip on his work. He explained the problem to the parent in detail. I would strongly recommend him as a pediatrician.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I consulted doctor for my baby's vaccination and weight related issues. We had consulted few other doctors before but was not satisfied with their responses. We are satisfied with his suggestions and there was satisfactory weight gain. He never gives antibiotics unless it is really required.

We were looking for a good doctor, then we came to know about him through practo. Now he is our daughterâ€™s permanent doctor. He listens very patiently and provides appropriate consultation. Earlier we had consulted various other doctors but didnâ€™t get satisfactory results. Vaccination too has become a easier affair nowadays.

My son (3.5 yrs) showed tiredness and lack of concentration since a long time(almost 1.5 years). We had consulted several doctors of Apollo Cradle and they after checking his Vitamin D prescribed a minimum dosage which kept the Vitamin D levels just '> Deficiency'. We accidentally met with Dr. Rohit, since our usual doctor was on leave and he took time for our consultation, explained us the various issues that could be caused due to vitamin D deficiency.  He recommended us to give 60K dosages of vit D. After 2-3 months of the prescribed medication, we could see lot of changes in our son. He was much active, attentive and also started responding in school. We changed our pediatrician to Dr.Rohit immediately.  
He remembers our sons details, every time we visit him and he takes interest in knowing the overall development of the child and not just treating the disease we came for.

I am consulting with Dr. Rohit for my 9 months old baby since birth in Apollo Cradle and the experience is quite amazing. 

He listens to our concerns patiently and gives time to every patient. The best part he gives us enough information about child growth management and how can we involve ourselves with child growing activity. Also he is very friendly in nature which give us comfort to discuss all aspects related to baby with him. I personally feel he is one of the best doctor around Whitefield/Brookfield area.

I would strongly recommend Dr. Rohit to all parents looking for a knowledgeable and caring Pediatrician.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
My Sincere Thanks to Dr Rohit for guiding us through ! , we went to him on emergency since my regular pediatrician was not available, but after consulting Dr Rohit and taking his diagnosis for my kids, I am now visiting him on a regular basis , 
He lends a patient ear to our queries, does a full examination of child, asks questions and probes into other health areas , he was the one who told upfront without any blood test that my kids are VitD3 deficient and even was able to detect minor heart related challenge for my Son, 

I would highly recommend parents to visit him , 

Once again Thank You Dr Rohit for helping and guiding us 
Regards
Rinki

On our every visit to Dr Rohit, he has given us plenty of time to answer all our queries and answers all of them. He is very patient and gentle. We visited a couple of other doctors before visiting Dr Rohit but we are rest assured now that our baby is in safe hands. We trust Dr Rohit completely and we definitely recommend Dr Rohit to whosoever is seeking the best.

When a vaccine was unavailable he ensured the hospital get that particular brand for us. A very dedicated doctor indeed.

It was very nice experience. Like most of the specialists he was not in hurry and spend good amount of time to understand the problem of my kid. He also explained me all the details on his view on the problem and as well on medicines he prescribed.

Doctor is very good. I consulted the doctor as my baby had fever. He listens to us calmly and suggests not to give medicine unnecessarily. He suggests not to addict babies to medicines from now only. His communication, treatment and response is very good.
